title: Create a write stream
description: Creates a write stream to append data rows to a BigQuery table. The stream is created in a PENDING state and can be used to write data. The stream must be finalized and committed before the data is visible in the table.

objective.narrative: This sample addresses the first step for streaming data into BigQuery using the Storage Write API. Developers must create a write stream to establish a connection before they can append data rows. This is the entry point for enabling high-throughput ingestion use cases, such as real-time analytics, log processing, and IoT event data.
